Field.Description: Parameters marked with ○ are excluded in the NT version package.
Reserve for package output 1
Reserve for package output 2

Field.DisplayName: Contact Land on Death - SE ID
Field.Description: SEID pronounced when contacting the ground after death. (-1: Invalid). SEID category is fixed to c

Field.DisplayName: Contact Land on Death - Additional SE ID
Field.Description: Additional SEID (for material) that sounds when it comes into contact with the ground after death. (-1: Invalid). SEID category is fixed to c

Field.DisplayName: Contact Land on Death - Play Count
Field.Description: Number of pronunciations when touching the ground after death

Field.DisplayName: Enable Play Count per Rigid Body Unit
Field.Description: Do you count the number of pronunciations of surface contact after death in rigid body units? (○: Rigid body unit, ×: Character unit)

Field.DisplayName: Contact Land on Death - Min Impulse
Field.Description: Minimum impulse value required for ground contact determination after death

Field.DisplayName: Contact Land on Death - Min Speed
Field.Description: Minimum speed value required for ground contact determination after death

Field.DisplayName: Contact Player on Death - SE ID
Field.Description: SEID that sounds when you come into contact with Player after death. (-1: Invalid). SEID category is fixed to c

Field.DisplayName: Contact Player on Death - Min Impulse
Field.Description: Minimum impulse value required for Player contact judgment after death

Field.DisplayName: Contact Player on Death - Min Speed
Field.Description: Minimum speed value required for Player contact judgment after death
